duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the design of CAN communication and development of functional requirements specific to mule and prototype vehicles.
Modify vehicle mule and prototype network topology diagram.
Develop gateway functional requirements to communicate between different CAN architectures.
Modify and map CAN/LIN network signals.
Flash, configure and calibrate modules to meet vehicle build requirements.
Troubleshoot / triage vehicle electrical systems to support Mule and Prototype vehicle builds.
Perform bench level simulation and testing to verify developed Gateway software.
Work with suppliers and Engineering Support teams as required to design and build mule and prototype vehicles.
Participate in architecture, system, design release, wiring, networking, and manufacturing teams as needed.

education_certification.credential: Bachelors in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, or Computer Science
